page.title: 19A FAMILY DAY IN SPARSHOLT.
page.content: On Saturday we get up later and I have a pony ride(hack)for an hour.My Mum takes my little sister to ballet and then I have tennis coaching.At lunch time we occasionally have fish and chips from the chip shop as a treat.In the afternoon Mum and Dad do some gardening and we play on our swing and slide, sometimes we go into Winchester shopping or visit the open air market. On Sundays we usually have a roast dinner which is Dad's favourite.On a nice sunny day we go to the New Forest or the sea side or visit London.When our grandparents visit us we like to go out walking in the countryside.We have salad for tea at weekends and we go to bed a bit later on Saturdays.
